SELECT se.id, se.user_id, se.order_code, se.staff_id, se.schedule_score, se.repair_score, se.service_score, se.score, se.create_date, si.NAME AS staffName, ui.NAME AS userName, oi.order_name FROM staff_evaluation se LEFT JOIN staff_info si ON ( si.id = se.staff_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = se.user_id ) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( oi.order_code = se.order_code ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND si.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffEvaluation.staffName},'%')
AND ui.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffEvaluation.userName},'%')
AND oi.`order_name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffEvaluation.orderName},'%')
ORDER BY se.create_date
